nodes.name: OMICrowdsale

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the owner to set the current rate for calculating the number of tokens for a purchase.
 @dev An external cron job will fetch the ETH/USD daily average from the cryptocompare API and call this function.
nodes.name: setRate

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the owner to update the total amount of USD raised. T
nodes.name: setUSDRaised

nodes.documentation:
@dev Gets the purchase records for a given address
 @param _beneficiary Tokan purchaser
nodes.name: getPurchaseRecord

nodes.documentation:
@dev Adds single address to whitelist
 @param _beneficiary Address to be added to the whitelist
nodes.name: addToWhitelist

nodes.documentation:
@dev Adds list of addresses to whitelist. Not overloaded due to limitations with truffle testing.
 @param _beneficiaries Addresses to be added to the whitelist
nodes.name: addManyToWhitelist

nodes.documentation:
@dev Removes single address from whitelist.
 @param _beneficiary Address to be removed to the whitelist
nodes.name: removeFromWhitelist

nodes.documentation: @dev Finalizes the crowdsale
nodes.name: finalize
_preValidatePurchase
_processPurchase
_updatePurchasingState

nodes.documentation: @dev Finalizes crowdsale
nodes.name: _finalization
